name: Tyco R/C: Assault with a Battery
description:
A racing combat game in the style of Mario Kart based on the Mattel owned Tyco R/C Toy Line. Tyco RC features eight real RC cars from the Tyco toy lineup, which includes Nitro Dozer, a racer with treads, which transforms into a bulldozer; Hot Rocker, a bug-shaped car that bashes through any obstacle; Tantrum, which spotlights a spinning axle that damages cars in front of it; Recoil, a 4X4 SUV that spins into a tornado to damage opponents; Fast Traxx, a dual motor vehicle with treads; the Rebound 4X4, a flipping mini-car packing lots of torque; and Speed Wrench, a wide pick-up truck that transforms into a vehicle twice its width.

The game features 6 highly interactive single player tracks each with two distinctive player activated interactive items. There is also a multi-play mode that allows for battle games and several other mini-game style two player match ups.
